name: Office Run
description:
Office Run is an endless runner game built around the office theme. Avoid obstacles, collect coins, buy power-ups, gain experience and level up. After you complete the game you can challenge other players to beat your online highscore.

Features

  • Free
  • 6 playable characters
  • 21 levels
  • Skills
  • Upgrades
  • Item shop with power-ups
  • Online highscores
  • Advanced lightning
  • Steam achievements & stats
  • Full controller support
